plugins.name: batchy
plugins.description:
batchy is a helper tool to make your exports more comfortable. Instead of just using the layer name and getting the layer size, you will now be able to write your own asset name dynamically with the help of export tokens and choosing between layer size or screen size for your assets.


Features

  1. dynamic asset names with several export tokens like: layers, date, file, scaling, index, user, top-level frame name,
  2. export assets in layer or screen size (top-level frame)
  3. export your current selection
  4. export from an asset list
  5. date formats for your naming
  6. export in common file formats like png, jpg, svg, pdf
  7. multiple files will be downloaded as a zip, single files will be downloaded as single files
  8. OS-proofed asset name support
plugins.tagline: Export your designs with dynamic name behaviors.

123462.name: batchy
123462.description:
batchy is a helper tool to make your exports more comfortable. Instead of just using the layer name and getting the layer size, you will now be able to write your own asset name dynamically with the help of export tokens and choosing between layer size or screen size for your assets.


Features

  1. dynamic asset names with several export tokens like: layers, date, file, scaling, index, user, top-level frame name,
  2. export assets in layer or screen size (top-level frame)
  3. export your current selection
  4. export from an asset list
  5. date formats for your naming
  6. export in common file formats like png, jpg, svg, pdf
  7. multiple files will be downloaded as a zip, single files will be downloaded as single files
  8. OS-proofed asset name support
123462.release_notes:
v1.2.2

**Bug fixes**
🪲 top-level frame export fixed
🪲 there was an issue when using the same token multiple times

**Additional changes**
✅ tokens now use a $ in the beginning instead of curly brackets in the beginning and the end. Example {{file}} --> $file
✅ $layerName token is now called $layer
✅ $userName token is now called $user
123462.tagline: Export your designs with dynamic name behaviors.

plugins.name: Fijira
plugins.description:
Streamline your workflow and eliminate the gap between design and project management with Fijira. This powerful plugin seamlessly connects your Figma designs directly to your Jira tickets, ensuring that your development team always has access to the latest frames, feedback, and design specifications.


Stop wasting time manually exporting assets and pasting links. With Fijira, you can create detailed Jira comments, update ticket statuses, and link specific Figma frames directly from within your design file.


Key Features:


One-Click Jira Comments: Create rich, formatted comments in Jira tickets directly from Figma.

Automatic Frame Linking: Automatically attach a link to your selected Figma frame. If no frame is selected, you have the option to paste a link manually.

Status Updates: View available transitions and update the status of your Jira tickets without leaving Figma.

Simple Markdown Editor: Format your comments with bold, italics, lists, and links to keep your communication clear and organized.

Secure & Private: Your Jira credentials are saved securely in your local Figma storage and are never exposed. All communication happens through a secure, private proxy server.

Easy Setup: A simple, one-time setup for your Jira domain, email, and API token gets you started in minutes.

How to Use:


Run the Plugin: Open Fijira from the plugins menu.

Enter Your Settings: In the settings view, enter your Jira domain (e.g., your-company.atlassian.net), your Jira account email, and a valid Jira API token.

Select a Frame (Optional): Select a single frame in your Figma file that you want to link.

Fill in Commit Details: In the commit view, enter a commit title, a detailed description (using the markdown editor!), and the target Jira issue key (e.g., PROJ-123).

Update Status (Optional): Choose a new status for your Jira ticket from the dropdown menu.

Commit! Click "Commit & Update Jira". Fijira will post your comment, link, and status change to the specified Jira ticket and create a new version in your Figma file history.

Say goodbye to context switching and hello to a more efficient workflow with Fijira!
plugins.tagline: Sync your Figma designs with Jira issue, seamlessly.

plugins.name: Get Image Type
plugins.description:
A simple plugin that analyzes your selected images and reveals their file formats with a single click. Stop guessing if that asset is a JPG, PNG, SVG, or WebP.


Does not support:

  1. Video/Movie Files: This plugin does not support identification of video or movie formats.


Note: Figma automatically converts certain image formats during import. HEIC and TIFF/TIF files are converted to PNG format when imported into Figma, so the plugin will identify these as PNGs. This reflects the actual format of the image within Figma, not necessarily the original source format.

accepted.name: Farren Wang
accepted.description: Farren's Figma account. Here you'll find stuff she's proud of.

plugins.tagline: Identify the format of images in your Figma designs

Note: Figma automatically converts certain image formats during import. HEIC and TIFF/TIF files are converted to PNG format when imported into Figma, so the plugin will identify these as PNGs. This reflects the actual format of the image within Figma, not necessarily the original source format.
136900.tagline: Identify the format of images in your Figma designs

plugins.name: WCAG Contrast Auditor
plugins.description:
WCAG Contrast Auditor is a Figma plugin that helps you guarantee your text meets WCAG accessibility standards—no manual math or guesswork required. Simply:


  1. Select the text layers you want to check (or select a parent frame to audit everything inside).
  2. Pick your background color and target WCAG level (AA or AAA).
  3. Run Audit to instantly see how many layers pass or fail the chosen contrast threshold.


Key benefits:

  1. Automated compliance checks: Scan dozens or hundreds of text layers in seconds.
  2. Flexible thresholds: Choose between WCAG AA (4.5:1) or AAA (7:1) contrast ratios.
  3. Lightweight & zero setup: No external dependencies—just install and go.
  4. Actionable results: Get a quick pass/fail count so you know exactly where to focus your fixes.


Whether you’re building design systems, client deliverables, or internal UIs, WCAG Contrast Auditor makes accessibility a seamless, one-click step in your workflow. Ensure every color combination is compliant—and ship more inclusive products today!
plugins.tagline: Spot & Fix WCAG Contrast Issues Instantly.

plugins.name: Detach Aliases
plugins.description:
Detach Aliases lets you resolve variable's aliased values from their sources. Easily detach a specific group of variables or all variables in a collection. You can target one mode at a time or all modes at once!


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  4. Detach


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering the path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input
  3. You will see all variables which are located in the path and would have aliases detached in the preview panel on the left


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  2. Detaching variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Break your collection aliases en masse!

131967.description:

131967.tagline: Break your collection aliases en masse!

plugins.name: FileDetox
plugins.description: FileDetox is a powerful Figma cleanup tool that hunts down and eliminates the hidden clutter slowing down your design files. With its distinctive neo-brutalist interface, FileDetox quickly identifies hidden layers, empty frames, unused styles, and off-canvas elements that contribute to file bloat. In just a few clicks, purge unnecessary elements and optimize your workflow. Design with intention, not with digital baggage. Made by gautham.

plugins.name: ShadeSmith – AI Palette Generator
plugins.description:
ShadeSmith is a Figma plugin that helps designers and developers instantly create scalable color palettes from a single base color (500-level).

It automatically generates tints, shades, and tonal variations using intelligent color logic. Whether you’re working on a design system, branding kit, or just experimenting, ShadeSmith ensures visually consistent and WCAG-compliant palettes with every click.


✨ Features:

•Start from any hex/RGB/base color

•Instantly generate tints (100–400) and shades (600–900)

•Accessible contrast suggestions built-in

•Copy-ready output for Figma styles, Tailwind tokens, or CSS

•Customizable intensity and range sliders


Perfect for:

•Design systems

•Theming

•Light/dark mode variants

•Rapid prototyping

accepted.name: Chandu Thota
accepted.description: I am a design leader with demonstrated expertise and experience of leading and delivering new product innovation, forming strategic design directions.

plugins.tagline: Generate full-color palettes in one click.

plugins.name: Numeric Variable Checker
plugins.description:
Numeric Variable Checker は、Figma上で数値のハードコーディング（Variablesが適用されていない数値）を検出し、一覧で確認できるプラグインです。


対象は、padding・spacing・width・height・cornerRadius・strokeWeight などの数値プロパティ。


Variablesが未適用の数値だけを抽出し、親子階層を含めて再帰的にチェック。

該当のフレームにはワンクリックでジャンプできます。


-


Numeric Variable Checker is a Figma plugin that helps you detect and list raw numeric values in your design—such as padding, spacing, width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight—that are not yet connected to Variables.


Whether you're building a design system or refining your layout for scalability, this plugin ensures your numbers are consistent, maintainable, and tokenized.


It recursively scans all selected frames and their children, highlights unbound values, and lets you jump to each frame with one click.
plugins.tagline: For designs that stay consistent down to the pixel.

Variablesが未適用の数値だけを抽出し、親子階層を含めて再帰的にチェック。

該当のフレームにはワンクリックでジャンプできます。


-


Numeric Variable Checker is a Figma plugin that helps you detect and list raw numeric values in your design—such as padding, spacing, width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight—that are not yet connected to Variables.


Whether you're building a design system or refining your layout for scalability, this plugin ensures your numbers are consistent, maintainable, and tokenized.


It recursively scans all selected frames and their children, highlights unbound values, and lets you jump to each frame with one click.

plugins.name: ChromaPulse
plugins.description:
“ChromaPulse” is an image color analysis plugin of Figma, that extracts dominant and prominent colors from nodes which are filled with an image and generates palettes.


***** This plugin is a one-time paid plugin, with up to 5 trials available. *****


👉 Check out the details on ChromaPulse Website.

🔑 You can buy a License Key on Gumroad.


//


“ChromaPulse” は塗りに画像が設定されたノードのドミナントカラー（支配色）やプロミネントカラー（特長色）を抽出し、パレットを生成する Figma で動作する色調解析プラグインです。


***** このプラグインは1回払いの有料プラグインで、5回までのトライアルが可能です。 *****


👉 詳しくは ChromaPulse ウェブサイト をご覧ください。

🔑 ライセンスキーは Gumroad でご購入いただけます。
plugins.tagline: ChromaPulse is an image color analysis plugin of Figma, that extracts dominant and prominent colors.

plugins.name: 图形透视变换 Perspective Transform
plugins.description:
介绍

图形透视变换是一个强大的 Figma 插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您轻松实现矢量图形的透视变形。通过直观的界面和灵活的控制，您可以快速调整图形的四个角点，创造出专业级的设计效果。


功能说明

  1. 实时透视调整：通过拖动四个角点，实时调整矢量图形的透视效果。
  2. 精确控制：基于相对比例定位，确保变形的精准性和一致性。
  3. 自动更新：选择新的图形时，插件自动重新计算并定位角点。
  4. 重置功能：一键恢复图形到初始状态，方便反复调整。
  5. 兼容多种图形：支持矩形及简单的四边形矢量图形。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 中选择一个矩形或四边形矢量图形。
  2. 运行透视变换（专业版）插件。
  3. 在插件界面中，拖动四个角点以调整图形的透视效果。
  4. 点击“重置”按钮可将图形恢复到原始状态。
  5. 观察 Figma 中的图形实时更新，直至达到满意的设计效果。


注意事项

  1. 仅支持简单的四边形路径，复杂路径可能无法正确解析。
  2. 在使用插件前，建议备份原始图形以防止数据丢失。
  3. 插件当前版本不支持曲线或多路径的矢量图形。
  4. 确保 Figma 已更新到最新版本，以获得最佳使用体验。


Introduction

Perspective Transform Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed for designers to effortlessly achieve perspective transformations on vector graphics. With an intuitive interface and flexible controls, you can quickly adjust the four corner points of your graphics to create professional-grade design effects.


Function Description

  1. Real-Time Perspective Adjustment: Manipulate the four corner points to adjust the perspective of vector graphics in real-time.
  2. Precise Control: Based on relative proportions, ensuring accuracy and consistency in transformations.
  3. Automatic Updates: Automatically recalculates and repositions corner points when selecting new graphics.
  4. Reset Functionality: One-click reset to restore graphics to their original state for easy adjustments.
  5. Compatibility with Various Shapes: Supports rectangles and simple quadrilateral vector graphics.


How to Use

  1. Select a rectangle or quadrilateral vector graphic in Figma.
  2. Run the Perspective Transform Pro plugin.
  3. In the plugin interface, drag the four corner points to adjust the perspective effect.
  4. Click the "Reset" button to restore the graphic to its original state.
  5. Observe the graphic in Figma updating in real-time until you achieve the desired design effect.


Precautions

  1. Supports only simple quadrilateral paths; complex paths may not parse correctly.
  2. It is recommended to backup original graphics before using the plugin to prevent data loss.
  3. The current version does not support curved or multi-path vector graphics.
  4. Ensure Figma is updated to the latest version for the best user experience.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Advanced Perspective Transformation for Designers

136434.name: 图形透视变换 Perspective Transform

Introduction

  4. Reset Functionality: One-click reset to restore graphics to their original state for easy adjustments.
  5. Compatibility with Various Shapes: Supports rectangles and simple quadrilateral vector graphics.


How to Use

plugins.name: Figma to Scabld
plugins.description:
Effortlessly Import Your Figma Designs into Scabld!


Transform your designs into mobile apps in no time with the Scabld plugin for Figma. Seamlessly bring your Figma screens into Scabld and move from design to a fully functional mobile app without any coding required. Our plugin automatically adapts your design to Scabld's no-code platform, so you can focus on turning your vision into reality.


How to use this plugin


1. Install the free Figma plugin.

2. Select your Figma designs.

3. Import them directly into Scabld.

4. Continue editing and customizing just like in Figma.

5. Add interactions and animations.

6. Finalize and publish your mobile app with zero code.


With Scabld, skip the hassle of manual conversions. Simply import your Figma files into our no-code platform and turn them into fully functional mobile apps. We preserve your layer names and design structure, making it easy to pick up where you left off and enhance your creations for a smooth user experience.


Preserve your layer structure.

When you import your designs, all your Figma groups and layer names are kept intact. This allows you to refine, adjust, and polish your app directly in Scabld without losing any important details.


Performance and optimization guaranteed.

When you publish with Scabld, we ensure your mobile app is optimized for peak performance across all devices. Every file is tuned for a fast and smooth experience, providing a high-quality result without compromising speed.


To learn more about Scabld and explore our other features, visit scabld.com.
plugins.tagline: Import your Figma designs into Scabld effortlessly.

plugins.name: Text Harvest
plugins.description:
Text Harvest exports and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

Get a quick CSV file from your designs for your copywriting or localization team.


Export

  1. Make a selection or export the entire page if there's no selection
  2. The plugin export only the visible layers, and also ignore the duplicated ones
  3. You'll get a CSV file with layer names and its content
  4. You can skip text layers that you don't want to export by simply adding the symbol "!" at the beginning of the layer name


Update

  1. Make a selection or update the entire page if there's no selection
  2. Select the CSV file
  3. The plugin updates all the layers with the same name


Currently multicolumn CSV are not supported. If you need to translate to different languages, upload an independent CSV for each one
plugins.tagline: Export and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

100611.description:

  4. You can skip text layers that you don't want to export by simply adding the symbol "!" at the beginning of the layer name

plugins.name: Markdown Import
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、Google Docsやメモ帳などからコピーしたマークダウン形式のテキストを、Figmaのページ内にインポートするツールです。

「# 見出し1 」「 ## 見出し2」「### 見出し3」「本文」の構造を自動で判別し、それぞれに対応するコンポーネントを選択して挿入することができます。


【主な機能】

  1. マークダウン記法でコピー＆ペースト → 自動でレイアウト生成
  2. 見出し1〜3、本文、それぞれに同一ページ内の任意のコンポーネントを割り当て可能
  3. コンポーネント内のテキストレイヤーを自動で認識し、文字を置換


---


This plugin lets you import markdown-style text into your Figma page directly from Google Docs, Notepad, or any markdown editor.


It automatically parses the structure of your content—such as # Heading 1, ## Heading 2, ### Heading 3, and body text —and allows you to assign custom components for each section during import.


【Key Features】

  1. Paste markdown-formatted text and auto-generate layout in Figma
  2. Assign your preferred components for headings (H1–H3) and body text
  3. Detect and replace text inside the designated layer of each component
plugins.tagline: マークダウンのテキストをコンポーネントを適用してインポート | Import markdown into Figma with component mapping.

plugins.name: Timestamp
plugins.description:
Timestamp is a lightweight plugin that renames selected frame(s) with the current date and time (like 05/29/2025 @ 8:15 PM). It’s perfect for marking work as done, tracking updates, or handing off designs with a clear time log.


Just select your frames, run the plugin, and click to rename ✨ A simple way to stay organized and keep your version history crystal clear.
plugins.tagline: Rename selected frames with the current date and time.

135132.name: Timestamp
135132.description:
Timestamp is a lightweight plugin that renames selected frame(s) with the current date and time (like 05/29/2025 @ 8:15 PM). It’s perfect for marking work as done, tracking updates, or handing off designs with a clear time log.


Just select your frames, run the plugin, and click to rename ✨ A simple way to stay organized and keep your version history crystal clear.
135132.tagline: Rename selected frames with the current date and time.

plugins.name: Remote Variable Replacer
plugins.description:
Sometimes Figma variables aren’t coming from inside the house. While this plugin has a likely very tiny amount of potential users, if I can help anybody save any time trying to locate and replace variables that are orphans or “remote”, then this has been worth it.


For whatever reason, variables in Figma can be attached to other libraries, older files, archived files even. This can cause major headaches when editing local variables and components don’t seem to respond to the edits.


I fully expect this plugin to have a limited lifespan as Figma themselves will likely improve variable handling during copy/pastes, schema renaming or other scenarios where variables can be orphaned.


In the meantime, I got you.
plugins.tagline: Replace those pesky remote variables!

135284.name: Remote Variable Replacer
135284.description:
Sometimes Figma variables aren’t coming from inside the house. While this plugin has a likely very tiny amount of potential users, if I can help anybody save any time trying to locate and replace variables that are orphans or “remote”, then this has been worth it.


For whatever reason, variables in Figma can be attached to other libraries, older files, archived files even. This can cause major headaches when editing local variables and components don’t seem to respond to the edits.


I fully expect this plugin to have a limited lifespan as Figma themselves will likely improve variable handling during copy/pastes, schema renaming or other scenarios where variables can be orphaned.


In the meantime, I got you.
135284.release_notes:
Improved the dropdowns for numerical variables to only show local variables whose base value match the remote variable base value. This should make the plugin easy to navigate if a user has hundreds of variables.

Removed beta language; Included network access for tailwind for easy stying and unpkg.com for React. This should fix the blank screen of death. Rookie mistake!

Also updated the data security details to let users know the network access is only for static items.

plugins.name: colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer
plugins.description:
Zendeeps | colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer helps you understand the color distribution in your Figma frames. Select any frame, and the plugin shows:

•How many unique colors are used

•Which colors appear the most

•The percentage breakdown of each color


It scans fills, strokes, and effects to give you a quick overview of your color usage—perfect for design audits, cleanup, and maintaining consistency.


No setup required. Just open the plugin, click a frame, and see the stats.

accepted.name: Ruhul
accepted.description: Senior UX/UI Designer and Webflow Developer

plugins.tagline: Visualize your color usage at a glance.

135187.name: colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer
135187.description:
Zendeeps | colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer helps you understand the color distribution in your Figma frames. Select any frame, and the plugin shows:

•How many unique colors are used

•Which colors appear the most

•The percentage breakdown of each color


It scans fills, strokes, and effects to give you a quick overview of your color usage—perfect for design audits, cleanup, and maintaining consistency.


No setup required. Just open the plugin, click a frame, and see the stats.
135187.tagline: Visualize your color usage at a glance.

plugins.name: Font Replacer
plugins.description:
Instantly view all fonts used in your selection, selectively replace specific font families, and preserve font weights and styles when switching to new fonts. Whether you're cleaning up inconsistent typography, updating your brand, or exploring new typefaces, Font Replacer makes the process fast, intuitive, and reliable.


  1. See all fonts in your selection at a glance
  2. Replace one or multiple font families with a single click
  3. Maintains font weights/styles (e.g., Bold, Italic) when switching families
  4. Handles mixed-font text layers and nested groups
  5. Smart fallbacks ensure your text always looks great
  6. Clean, modern UI with loading indicators for large selections
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly swap and manage fonts in your Figma designs

134520.name: Font Replacer
134520.description:
Instantly view all fonts used in your selection, selectively replace specific font families, and preserve font weights and styles when switching to new fonts. Whether you're cleaning up inconsistent typography, updating your brand, or exploring new typefaces, Font Replacer makes the process fast, intuitive, and reliable.


  1. See all fonts in your selection at a glance
  2. Replace one or multiple font families with a single click
  3. Maintains font weights/styles (e.g., Bold, Italic) when switching families
  4. Handles mixed-font text layers and nested groups
  5. Smart fallbacks ensure your text always looks great
  6. Clean, modern UI with loading indicators for large selections
134520.tagline: Effortlessly swap and manage fonts in your Figma designs

plugins.name: Find lost local — «Найти потерянные локальные компоненты»
plugins.description:
🔍 Find lost local automatically catches every local instance whose master component lives in another library / document.

Just set a prefix symbol (default “_”) and choose the search scope—current page or whole file.


Features

•Any nesting depth – detects instances hidden inside local components and their masters.

•Page-level grouping – shows how many problematic components each page contains.

•One-click jump – selects and zooms to the target instance.

•Custom prefix – works with _Tabs, .hidden, -draft, @deprecated, or any symbol you use for local components.


When it helps

•Before publishing a library – make sure no stray local copies remain in the file.

•During a design-system migration – quickly spot legacy components that still point elsewhere.

•While reviewing external files – instantly see what is pulled from external libraries.


How to use

1.Open the plugin and, if needed, change the prefix symbol.

2.Pick Current page or Whole file and click Search.

3.Review the grouped list. Clicking a component name jumps to its first found instance.

4.Items labelled “Outside pages” exist only inside master components; fix them in the corresponding library.


The plugin works entirely inside Figma—no internet access required, and no data ever leaves your account.


🔍 Find lost local автоматически вылавливает в вашем файле любые локальные инстансы, мастеры которых живут в другой библиотеке / документе.

Достаточно указать символ-префикс (по умолчанию — «_») и выбрать область поиска — текущую страницу или весь файл.


Возможности

  1. Любая глубина вложенности: находит инстансы, спрятанные внутри локальных компонентов и их мастеров.
  2. Группировка по страницам с подсчётом, сколько проблемных компонентов найдено на каждой.
  3. Переход одним кликом: выбирает и фокусирует нужный инстанс.
  4. Настраиваемый префикс: работает не только с «_Tabs», но и с «.hidden», «-draft», «@deprecated» — любым символом, который вы используете для локальных компонентов.


Когда пригодится

  1. Перед публикацией библиотеки — убедитесь, что в файле нет «висящих» локальных копий.
  2. Во время миграции компонентов из старой дизайн-системы в новую.
  3. При ревью сторонних файлов, чтобы сразу увидеть, что тянется из внешних библиотек.


Как пользоваться

  1. Откройте плагин и при необходимости поменяйте символ-префикс.
  2. Выберите Текущая страница или Весь файл и нажмите Поиск.
  3. Изучите сгруппированный список. Клик по названию компонента перенесёт вас к первому найденному инстансу.
  4. Компоненты, отмеченные как «Вне страницы», находятся только внутри мастеров — их можно исправить в контексте соответствующей библиотеки.


Плагин не требует интернет-доступа и не отправляет данные за пределы вашего аккаунта Figma.
plugins.tagline: Find all local component instances whose master lives in another file

plugins.name: Auto Layout Checker
plugins.description:
Auto Layout Checker helps you maintain design consistency by identifying and converting elements that don't use Auto Layout. Perfect for cleaning up designs and ensuring layout consistency across your files.


🔍 Key Features:

• Scan entire pages or selected elements for missing Auto Layout

• One-click conversion of frames and groups to Auto Layout

• Clear visual feedback for converted elements

• Theme-aware interface that matches your Figma theme

• Quick navigation to elements through direct selection


🎯 Perfect for:

• Design system cleanup and maintenance

• Legacy file modernization

• Team collaboration and consistency checks

• Quick Auto Layout implementation


💡 How to use:

1. Select elements to scan (or leave unselected to scan entire page)

2. Click "Scan" to find elements without Auto Layout

3. Click any element to navigate to it in your design

4. Use the "Convert" button to instantly apply Auto Layout


The plugin automatically applies sensible Auto Layout defaults:

• Vertical layout orientation

• 10px spacing between elements

• 10px padding on all sides

• Automatic sizing for both axes


Keep your designs maintainable and responsive with Auto Layout Checker!
plugins.tagline: Quickly find and convert elements missing Auto Layout, streamlining your design system consistency.

plugins.name: Airlogo
plugins.description:
Designing travel apps, booking websites, or aviation dashboards? Airline Logos makes your workflow faster and cleaner by giving you instant access to hundreds of up-to-date, high-quality airline logos—right inside Figma.


Easily search by airline name, IATA/ICAO code, or country, and drag logos directly into your designs. All logos are optimized for digital use, SVG-based, and consistently styled to save you time and ensure visual harmony across your project.


Perfect for:


Travel & aviation UI/UX designers

Booking platforms and flight aggregators

Prototypes that need real-world branding

No more hunting down logos or worrying about outdated assets. With Airline Logos, your design stays current and cohesive—effortlessly.
plugins.tagline: Library of Airline Logos

plugins.name: EasySpotlight
plugins.description: EasySpotlight makes it simple to highlight key areas you want to focus on. Just turn your original image into a frame, add a new frame over the area you want to spotlight, select two frames, and click the "Create Spotlight" button. The plugin will dim the background and create a custom highlight—perfect for presentations, tutorials, or showcasing design details!
plugins.tagline: Spotlight key areas, dim the rest.

133188.name: EasySpotlight
133188.description: EasySpotlight makes it simple to highlight key areas you want to focus on. Just turn your original image into a frame, add a new frame over the area you want to spotlight, select two frames, and click the "Create Spotlight" button. The plugin will dim the background and create a custom highlight—perfect for presentations, tutorials, or showcasing design details!
133188.tagline: Spotlight key areas, dim the rest.

plugins.name: Layer Assistant
plugins.description:
Layer Assistant is a Figma plugin for efficient layer management, featuring:

✅ Expand/Collapse – Batch expand or collapse layer structures

✅ Show/Hide – Quickly toggle layer visibility

✅ Remove Hidden Layers – Clean up all invisible layers

✅ AutoLayout Conversion – Convert AutoLayout containers to basic Frames

✅ Remove Frames/Groups – Delete empty containers while preserving content


🌟 Key Benefits

🌐 Bilingual UI (EN/CN) - Switch languages instantly

⚡ Visual Operation - No need to remember shortcuts

🛠️ Non-destructive Processing - Preserves layer properties


✅ 展开/折叠 – 批量展开或折叠图层结构

✅ 显示/隐藏 – 快速显示或隐藏所选图层

✅ 删除隐藏图层 – 清理画布上所有不可见图层

✅ AutoLayout 转换 – 将 AutoLayout 批量转为普通 Frame

✅ 移除 Frame/Group – 删除冗余容器，保留内容


🌟 独家优势

🌐 双语支持 (中/英) - 一键切换语言

⚡ 可视化操作 - 无需记忆复杂快捷键

🛠️ 无损处理 - 智能保留图层属性
plugins.tagline: Simplify your layer workflow today!
